summary: I am a senior business analyst; I have successfully and creatively executed all aspects of SDLC for many projects, utilizing a variety of project development methodologies.  I am often the key liaison between the technology groups and the business/customers, helping them all to agree to and understand the project objectives, risks and rewards, and process. I am a comfortable communicator. I am also the project “memory”, producing and storing exceptional project documentation, and remembering and utilizing the details I hear, read, and see within and across projects. I'm both a big picture person and a down and dirty details gal -- I know where the pennies are, and I don’t let them round randomly.I am looking for full-time or consulting work doing detailed problem and data analysis, writing requirements, creating data mapping for a system conversion/upgrade.  I'm also interested in QA, third-party system gap analysis, and small-team project and process management.  I want to be challenged; I want to utilize and share my skills and  experiences  while learning new systems, industries, and  technologies.  I want latitude and support within the company/organization for interdisciplinary excursions.  I work best in a flexible team environment with a group of professionals transparently sharing knowledge, excitement, determination, responsibility, and success.
name: Robin Combs
title: Business Analyst, PM, QA
